pylayers.gis.layout.Layout.loadstr2

pylayers.gis.layout.Layout.savestr2¶

Layout.savestr2(_filename, furniture=False)[source]¶

save Layout in .str2 format

Parameters :

_filename : string

file is written in the struc directory of the current Project directory which is defined through the environment variable $BASENAME extension .str2 is added to short name filename furniture : boolean

Notes

To produce the .str file

> newstruc -str2 file.str2 -conf ../project.conf
